snippet: Poor earnings figures from two American lenders, Bank of America and Citigroup, contributed to extending a recent slide in stocks.
abstract: Stocks suffer their fifth consecutive day of decline, pushed down by disappointing results from major banks and continued decline of oil prices.
lead_paragraph: Poor earnings figures from two American lenders, Bank of America and Citigroup, contributed to extending a recent slide in stocks.

headline.main: Weak Bank Earnings Help Push Shares to a 5th Straight Drop
headline.print_headline: Weak Bank Earnings Help Push Shares to a 5th Straight Drop
